alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 2:32PM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
